byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo reported from Vatican City, and Liam Stack from New York.
byline.original: By ELISABETTA POVOLEDO and LIAM STACK

lead_paragraph: He made permanent a policy announced last year that allows priests worldwide to grant absolution for an act that the Roman Catholic Church considers a sin.
snippet: He made permanent a policy announced last year that allows priests worldwide to grant absolution for an act that the Roman Catholic Church considers a sin....

headline.main: Pope Francis Extends Priests’ Ability to Forgive Abortion
headline.print_headline: Pope Extends Priests’ Ability to Forgive the ‘Grave Sin’ of Abortion
